attributes.action: stop Department of Work and Pensions and Job Center Plus From Using 0845 Numbers On there Phone Services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
STOP!!!...Please Help Stop Department of Work and Pensions and Job Center Plus From Using 0845 Numbers with it's Phone Services.
This is to stop our most vunrable been ripped off when contacting Department of Work and Pensions and Job Center Plus.
Why Should people have to pay out for this service at the rate set By 0845 Numbers They are our most vunrable Members of society Been Ripped Off.
It Cost too much for people out of work to be paying this out and will effect the Benefits when this Money is most needed to help in the search For Work and Living Expenses,Some People will miss feeding Them selfs for the amount asked of by this premium Service?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
